tutorial_tasks.title: Update Slack Status
tutorial_tasks.description: Set your Slack status to 'thriving' and upload a professional headshot to the company portal.
tutorial_tasks.completion_text: Profile updated. HR sends a congratulatory GIF. You are now officially Corporate.

tutorial_tasks.title: Stop Reply-All Chain
tutorial_tasks.description: Someone replied-all to a company-wide email about free donuts. Now there are 147 replies. Make it stop.
tutorial_tasks.completion_text: Chain stopped. You sent reply #148 asking people to stop replying-all. Nobody sees the irony.

tutorial_tasks.title: CEO Nephew's Website
tutorial_tasks.description: The CEO's nephew made a website in 2003. It needs to 'work on mobile.' The CEO will personally review your work.
tutorial_tasks.completion_text: Site now responsive. CEO's nephew gets credit for 'his vision.' You get a thank-you email (not from the CEO).

tutorial_tasks.title: Migrate Legacy Database
tutorial_tasks.description: Migrate the 15-year-old user database to the new system. Previous developer left comments like 'DO NOT TOUCH' and 'I'M SO SORRY.'
tutorial_tasks.completion_text: Migration complete. You didn't read all the warnings. Surely it's fine.

tutorial_tasks.title: Payment Bug (Black Friday)
tutorial_tasks.description: The checkout sometimes charges customers twice. Sometimes not at all. Black Friday starts in 2 days. Legal is 'concerned.'
tutorial_tasks.completion_text: Bug patched. You tested it 47 times. Black Friday goes smoothly. Finance doesn't thank you.
